posts.post_content:
The following T206's are for sale to the first person who says "I'll take it." Check, money order, or paypal are welcome. I will send first class insured at my expense. Please PM or email me at [url]bsloate@verizon.net[/url]. Thank you.

T206 Jake Beckley PD 350- nice, well balanced SGC 50 VG-EX...$175
T206 Chief Bender (no trees) SC350- pinpoint chip to upper right corner, sliver of second name visible at top. SGC 50 VG-EX...SOLD
T206 Addie Joss (port) PD150- sharp card centered a touch to the left, SGC 50 VG-EX...$260
T206 Joe Kelley SC 350- Nice example centered a bit to the left, SGC 50 VG-EX...$160
